Headline: Red Line Service Delayed at Sox-35th
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing at Sox-35th due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running from 95th to 63rd and Roosevelt to Howard and due to police activity at Sox-35th.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.
These may include:

#29 State

As a result of the delay, shuttle buses are available from Roosevelt to 63rd/Dan Ryan to provide connecting service in both directions.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.
